titles.title: MP197 Great God of wonders, all thy ways

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Great God of wonders, all thy ways
Are matchless, god-like and divine;
but the fair glories of Thy grace
more god-like and unrivalled shine:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Such dire offences to forgive,
Such guilty daring souls to spare;
This is Thy grand prerogative,
And none shall in the honour share:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In wonder lost, with trembling joy,
we take the pardon of our God,
pardon for sins of deepest dye,
a pardon bought with Jesus' blood.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
O may this glorious matchless love,
this godlike miracle of grace,
teach mortal tongues, like those above,
to raise this song of lofty praise:

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Who is a pardoning God like Thee?
Or who has grace so rich and free?
